resources.string: There is error in the authentication service. Please try again later.
There is an error in the server. The account was not created. Please try again later.
The location permissions are required to access the map functions of the app. If you don\'t grant the permissions, you can\'t set the lost location in the map.
Please make sure you entered pet\'s name, date of lost and place of lost

Please fill in the form for your lost pet. We\'ll store the data in the database. If anyone found the pet, we\'ll send an email to you. If the other users want to search for lost pets, the pet\'s data will be listed to the users.
Please fill in the form. We\'ll match lost pet\' information with the data here. If we found a match, we\'ll email you and the owner.
Below is a list of the lost pets reported. If you found the pet or have seen the dog, you can leave the owner a message here.
Below is a list of the pets found. If you lost a pet, you can check out the list and click send message to contact the person.
Your message has been sent to the pet owner.
There is error in sending the message. Please make sure you have wifi. If the error persists, there is probably error in the server.
The owner didn\'t set the location in the map. Please refer to the location description.
Please enter anything you want to note.
The current password and the new password are the same. There is no need to update.
The current password you entered was incorrect. Please try again.
The server has error. Please try again later.
Please enter the email that used to register this app. The server will send you an email with the password reset link.
The login credentials are incorrect. Either the email or password is incorrect, or both.
Reset email was sent. Please check your email.
Either the email you entered was not in our record, or there was an error in the server. Please try again.
The email you entered was not valid. Please try again.

The app let the user report their lost pets or found pets. The data will be saved in the database.

The other users can read the data anytime they like. So if a user lost a pet, he/she can read the found pets list to see if anyone found his/her pet. Vice versa for a user who found a pet.

The app dedicates to help pet owners to find their lost pets. You can also send message to the pet owner directly in the app.
The report was sent to the server successfully. We\'ll send an email to you if there is anyone found the pet.
There is error in the server. Please try again later.
You can only enter a date back to ten years ago till now.
There is error in sending the message. Please make sure you have wifi. If the error persists, there is probably error in the server.
The app doesn\'t allow users send messages to themselves.
The email you entered already existed in the database. Please login using this email, or register a new account using another email.
There is error in the server. Please try again later.
The pet report was updated successfully.
Are you sure you want to delete this report?
The app failed to delete the report. The server may be down. Please make sure the WIFI is on. Please try again later.
